conclusion: Analyze the movement of object A indicated by the red arrow to determine collision and stop position.
Object A is the small car located in the lower right corner.
The red arrow points to the right, indicating the direction of object A's movement.
Object A will collide with objects in its path as it moves to the right.
The objects that object A will collide with are the orange blocks in the lower left corner.
The car will eventually stop at the rightmost position on the green surface.
The car will collide with the orange blocks and come to a stop at the rightmost position on the green surface.
